item.title: Dec 10: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: Police charge 26-year-old Luigi Mangione with murder after UnitedHealthcare CEO's killing; Open AI launches text-to-video AI model.

item.title: Poet and activist Nikki Giovanni dies at age 81
item.description: Nikki Giovanni, who gained fame over her long career as a poet, author and public speaker, has died at the age of 81. She was the subject of the recen...

item.title: Will HELOC interest rates continue dropping this December?
item.description: HELOC interest rates have been on a decline for much of 2024 but will they continue to drop this month?

item.title: Kroger's $24.6 billion purchase of Albertsons halted by federal judge
item.description: Merger would curtail competition for grocery shoppers, Oregon court finds in a decision that likely derails the deal.

item.title: Syrians await Turkey border entry after fall of Assad's regime
